content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #233

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 27

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Prefetch template
Type: NEG :exclamation:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

Individual hooks specify which of their context fields can be used as prefetch tokens. Only root-level fields with a primitive value within the context object are eligible to be used as prefetch tokens.
For instance, given a hook of example-hook with the following context in which the patientIdand medicationId fields are both denoted as prefix tokens:

Comment:
This text is unclear

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will work with the commenter (Bas) to clarify this text

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #233

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod

We will work with the commenter (Bas) to clarify this text

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
